msg: - Updated struts-form.xml to allow for new form:image tag

author: mschachter
msg: - Tag class for form inputs of type "image"

author: dgeary
msg: Allow direct content to be specified in the body of the template:put tag

author: craigmcc
msg: Document the enhanced usability of the <form:form> tag.

author: craigmcc
msg: Fix bugs in the <form:form> tag's ability to deduce the correct form bean
name and Java class type from the corresponding action mapping entry.
Make the Struts example application rely on this feature.
This substantially improves the usability of Struts, because the actual
Java class name, and the scope you wish to store a form bean in, are
specified *only* in the "struts-config.xml" file.  For example, the login
page's form tag looks like this:
